DOC.brief_title: A Non-interventional Study Evaluate Use Pliaglis Daily Practice
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-center , non-interventional study , include 700 subject approximately 70 site 5 European country evaluate post-market safety profile Pliaglis efficacy Pliaglis term pain reduction , satisfaction product daily practice use prior pre-defined aesthetic procedure .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Patient treat Pliaglis Investigator healthcare professional accord label ( refer SmPC ) Patient already consent receive one follow aesthetic procedure Pliaglis administration : 1 . Pulseddye laser therapy 2 . Laserassisted hair removal 3 . Nonablative laser resurface 4 . Dermal filler injection 5 . Vascular access Patient treat injectable topical anaesthetic ( ) predefined aesthetic procedure Previous participation study
